464 
465 
466 inline
467 void
468 CompressedSetSparsityPattern::add (const size_type i,
469  const size_type j)
470 {
471  Assert (i<rows, ExcIndexRangeType<size_type>(i, 0, rows));
472  Assert (j<cols, ExcIndexRangeType<size_type>(j, 0, cols));
473 
474  lines[i].add (j);
475 }
476 
477 
478 
479 template <typename ForwardIterator>
480 inline
481 void
482 CompressedSetSparsityPattern::add_entries (const size_type row,
483  ForwardIterator begin,
484  ForwardIterator end,
485  const bool /*indices_are_sorted*/)
486 {
487  Assert (row < rows, ExcIndexRangeType<size_type> (row, 0, rows));
488 
489  lines[row].add_entries (begin, end);
490 }
491 
492 
493 
494 inline
495 CompressedSetSparsityPattern::size_type
496 CompressedSetSparsityPattern::row_length (const size_type row) const
497 {
498  Assert (row < n_rows(), ExcIndexRangeType<size_type> (row, 0, n_rows()));
499 
500  return lines[row].entries.size();
501 }
502 
503 
504 
505 inline
506 CompressedSetSparsityPattern::row_iterator
507 CompressedSetSparsityPattern::row_begin (const size_type row) const
508 {
509  return (lines[row].entries.begin ());
510 }
511 
512 
513 
514 inline
515 CompressedSetSparsityPattern::row_iterator
516 CompressedSetSparsityPattern::row_end (const size_type row) const
517 {
518  return (lines[row].entries.end ());
519 }
